scripts.build: vite build && cp dist/index.html dist/404.html && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.firebase-codegen: firebase-bolt src/security-rules.bolt --output src/generated/security-rules.json && echo '/* eslint-disable */' > src/generated/security-rules.ts && firebase-bolt-compiler < src/security-rules.bolt >> src/generated/security-rules.ts
